Description: Join our 'Yoga for Beginners' session, led by the experienced instructor Lisa Smith. This class is designed to introduce you to the world of Yoga in a gentle and accessible way. Whether you're completely new to Yoga or looking to refine your practice, this session is perfect for you. During the 60-minute session, you'll learn foundational Yoga poses, breathing techniques, and relaxation methods. It's a holistic approach to improving flexibility, reducing stress, and promoting overall well-being. Come join us on Tuesdays from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM and embark on a journey to a healthier, more balanced you.
